issue.title: [C++] Reorganize testing headers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, `gtest_util.h` contains a hodge-podge of different things.
It would be nice if things were separated a bit more, for example a `asserts.h` file for all home-grown assertion functions and macros.
Also a separate header for `ArrayFromVector` and friends, to avoid including `builder.h` everywhere.
